response.overview: More than a documentary, Our Blues Make Us Gold is a celebration of HBCU legacy, culture, and impact. Directed by From A2B Studios, the film weaves personal stories, stunning visuals, and appearances from Vice President Kamala Harris, Rev. Al Sharpton, and David Banner to highlight the resilience and pride that define these institutions.  Centered on North Carolina A&T State University, the nationâ€™s largest HBCU, it explores the profound influence of this school on education, social justice, and Black culture.
response.title: Our Blues Make Us Gold
